original_text: I promised to save you, and I did what I said I would do. I told everyone what I had done. There was no foreign god among you, who did that for you. So you are the people who must say that I am the only true God.’ That is what the Lord says. I promised to save you,
korean_text: 내가 알려 주었으며 구원하였으며 보였고 너희 중에 다른 신이 없었나니 그러므로 너희는 나의 증인이요 나는 하나님이니라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: and I did what I said I would do
I told everyone what I had done
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내가 한 일을 모두에게 말했다

sentences.original_text: There was no foreign god among you
So you are the people who must say
that I am the only true God
That is what the Lord says
